page.title: 07SPORT IN WARBOYS 2
page.content: {BADMINTON CLUB The{Badminton Club}is held at the school in the main hall.The club is held on Tuesday and Wednesday from seven till ten and it has twenty four members. {BOWLS CLUB } The White Hart{Bowls Club}has more than 90 members.The{Bowls Club}play two leagues ,the first division and the fourth division.The club has been running for over 50 years.The club is held behind the White Hart and is held every day of the week in season. {DARTS } In the{Darts Club}there are 32 members.The{Darts Club}has been running since 1948 and based sometimes at the Royal Oak.The club is held on every Wednesday and Thursday.The teams play in two leagues.
